solution_line_template: He makes ${monthly_income} and his bills are ${total_monthly_bills} so that leaves {monthly_income}-{total_monthly_bills} = $<<{monthly_income}-{total_monthly_bills}={remaining_after_bills}>>{remaining_after_bills}
If he buys a car with a monthly car payment of ${car_payment} then that leaves {remaining_after_bills}-{car_payment} = ${left_for_gas_maintenance} left over for gas and maintenance
